Libby Raymond

Mechanical Engineering and Design

About Me

I'm a current Northwestern Student majoring in Mechanical Engineering, with a Design Certificate from the Segal Design Institute.

At an early age, my passion for photography helped me develop a keen eye for aesthetics and detail. Now as a mechanical engineering student, I'm merging this creativity with technical precision to design innovative solutions that are not only functional but also thoughtfully crafted to enhance user experiences.
